org.easybatch.core.reader

Class IterableMultiRecordReader<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.easybatch.core.reader.MultiRecordReader
      • org.easybatch.core.reader.AbstractMultiRecordReader
        • org.easybatch.core.reader.IterableMultiRecordReader<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of records in the iterable data source.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    RecordReader

    public class IterableMultiRecordReader<T>
extends AbstractMultiRecordReader
    Reads records in chunks from an iterable data source.
    Author:
    Mahmoud Ben Hassine (mahmoud@benhassine.fr)
